entry.title: WIND WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 12:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: ESE 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 2 cm over Grand Manan Island. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 in the morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
